Text:
If you want to see this movie NOW w/ out leaving your home or paying admission, than this is TOTALLY WATCHABLE! The microphone couldn't quite capture the Dolby Surround Sound, but IT IS AUDIBLE TOO!
I am VERY HAPPY since my car is out of service and my boy couldn't wait to see this!
SO A BIG THANKS to TV TEAM!
The CAM WAS GREAT and so was the TURN-AROUND TIME!
